experience.title: IoT Developer at LiftAuth

quote.text: Thiru is a passionate engineer who exceeded all expectations in his work at LiftAuth.

experience.title: Software Team, Singapore AUV Challenge

experience.content: Achieved 13th place in the finals as part of NUS Bumblebee's Team Hornet. Specialized in implementing camera vision techniques, including optical flow and YOLO detection models for improved drone velocity and target recognition.
